meanings.sent1: The company billboarded their new product on a huge sign.
meanings.sent2: They billboarded the upcoming concert on the highway.
meanings.sent3: The town billboarded the local event with colorful posters.
meanings.sent4: Her smile billboarded her happiness to the world.
meanings.sent5: The neon lights billboarded the city skyline at night.
